Description: From left to right: Prof. Gerhard Rouve, Civil Engineering (third from left), Prof. Wolfgang Scheer, Mechanical Engineering (fourth from left), Prof. Guenter Stahl, Mechanical Engineering (fifth from left), dignitary (yet to be identified), Prof. Werner Koch, Physics, Prof S. Sampath, Head of Department of Electrical Engineering, chief guest Dr. C. Rajagopalachari, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors, Dr. K. S. G. Doss, Member, Board of Governors, Prof. P. C. Varghese, Head of Department of Civil Engineering, Dr. G. S. Laddha, Director, A.C. Tech.) and Prof. R. G. Narayanamurthi, Head of Department of Mechanical Engineering.
